name: TEACH surviving School
description:
Realistic

A game based on my own experience as a secondary teacher.

I tried to create a game based on how you feel as a teacher. During my career I have discovered that as they say teaching can be one of the most stressful jobs out there. But also it can be extremely fun and engaging. In the end you hardly have a second to get bored, if it is sorting out the behavior of the classroom , marking , teaching your subject, handling parents, your boss. You always choose and develop the art of teaching, and at the end of the day , you get to be an important role model for future generations.

Features

Experience teaching in a school with all its ups and downs, the stress of teaching the curriculum, managing students behavior and teach them across 4 different subjects . Do you want to be a nice teacher and improve their attitude, or do you want to be strict and win the race for good grades?

Its your choice.

Become the teacher you always wanted to be

-Answer to them when they call out in class

-Solve students problems at playtime

-Improve students grades or attitude

-Mark their homework

-Deal with their problems

-Work on mini quizzes for each subject while you pay attention to their behavior. Just like in real life.

-Every action counts

Try it!

This is a solo project. With help from Basil for graphical design.

Thank you for playing it!
